column1: on the money straightaway. A length ball in the channel and going with the angle. Gayle keeps his bat behind his pads
some swing there but went almost parallel to the ground, once again in the channel but Gayle is not interested
another length ball in the corridor, not much swing this time though, left alone
this one moves away, much closer to the batsman as well, Gayle comes forward but doesn't bother playing at it
hits the length once again, a little bit of movement away from the batsman, Gayle defends on the front foot
a touch fuller this time, Gayle walks forward and gently pushes it towards cover, a maiden to start with
short of length outside off, Evin looks to force it on the off side from the back foot, misses as the ball keeps low
in the air but safe. Short of length outside off, but it stops a bit at the batsman who had to check his shot. Goes safely towards third man
a touch fuller outside off, comes forward and pushes it towards mid-on
short of length outside off, steered towards third man off the bottom part of the bat
length ball angling in towards the batsman, Lewis moves forward and defends it in front of his pads, kept a touch low once again
length ball angling towards the stumps, no issues with the bounce this time, defended from the back foot
length ball around off and leaving with the angle, shouldered arms
short of length, around off and swinging away, Gayle defends it awkwardly from the crease, taking the bottom hand off
short of length on the leg stump, still some swing for Bhuvneshwar, Gayle comes forward and defends it back
length outside off but too far from the batsman to invite any shot
short of length on middle and leg, Gayle was looking to come forward but had to defend in the end
length ball around off, Gayle pushes it towards mid-off and sets off, had to sprint but makes it easily in the end
brilliant yorker, right on the money but Gayle is up to it, gets his bat down and keeps it out
length ball outside off, Gayle presents the full face of the bat but a tumbling stop by Dhawan to his right at mid-off keeps it to one
length ball on the stumps, defended from the crease by Lewis
length ball in the channel, left alone by Lewis

length ball on the stumps, raps Lewis on the pads but was perhaps going down, Lewis was looking for a single but returns back in time as the ball rolls towards square leg, Jadhav hits the stumps direct and concedes two overthrows. Replay shows the ball would have gone on to hit the leg stump but India didn't opt to review. Mind you, Shami was bowling around the wicket
length ball on the stump, pushed towards mid-on for one more
length ball around off, stays back and punches it down the wicket
length ball on the pads, Lewis misses the flick and his struck on the pads
length ball on the stumps, defended from the crease
induces an outside edge but goes through the vacant gully area, was a length ball and Bhuvi once again got it to move away, Lewis was merely pushing at it
length ball outside off, punched on the off side from back foot
length ball but once again too far away from Gayle who is happy to let it go
length ball outside off, comes forward and defends it towards mid-on
fuller on the stumps this time, pushes it towards mid-on and sets off immediately this time
length ball on the middle and leg, dabbed towards square leg
goes for the yorker but just misses his mark, Gayle gets his front leg out and pushes it towards mid-on
fullish and just a shade outside off, check-driven to the covers
on a length and angling in at off from round the wicket, inside-edged to midwicket
full-length inswinger from Bhuvneshwar, Lewis is caught on the crease, and inside-edges onto the pad. He often plays around his front pad and gets out lbw
full and outside off, Lewis throws his hands at the ball and ekes out an inside edge onto the pad
back of a length and shoved down the leg side for a wide
full and swerving down the leg side for another wide
Swatted into the deserted stands! Short and angling away outside off, Lewis sizes it up and shovel-pulls it up and over deep square leg
on a length and outside off, Lewis drives on the up and skews it to cover-point, where Jadhav throws himself to his right to stop the ball
on a length and outside off, chopped straight to point. 118kph slower variation from Bhuvneshwar
full and nipping away outside off, Gayle simply shoulders arms to it
full-toss darted on the pads, tucked away fine of long leg for four. Easy peasy
full and sliding into middle and leg, Lewis doesn't quite move his feet and stabs it to the midwicket region
chipped in the air...but does not carry to short midwicket. Possibly a slower cutter from Khaleel, Lewis is early into his flick and gets away with that
hip-high short ball on middle stump, 137ks, you've got to get it up higher, Khaleel. Lewis muscles it off the front foot over midwicket. Pulled away
pitched up and holds its line outside off, 140ks, Lewis doesn't move his feet. No problem, though. Hacked away to the left of mid-on for another boundary
slower ball just a shade outside off, quietly knocked between covers and point
looped up on middle, and sharply turns past the outside edge. A delightful cocktail of drift, dip, and turn
Lewis now reads the turn and chops towards point to get off the strike
full on middle, played back
starts outside off and spins further away, left alone
punched off the back foot to point
flighted outside off, defended
shortish and outside off, forced to mid-off
on a length and slanting in at middle, jabbed back to Khaleel
hip-high short ball on middle, Lewis jumps across off, gets inside the line and launches another pull over midwicket. Bam
short on middle, shimmies and forces the ball wide of midwicket
pitched further up and outside off, no movement in the air or off the seam, driven through the line to the covers
full, outside off, Gayle drives to cover, and a fumble allows a single
Gayle gone for 4 off 31 balls! Kuldeep lobs it up on off, full, Gayle looks to whack it over the leg side and break free. Instead, he drags it back onto the stumps via a thick inside edge
driven down to long-on off the front foot
mighty full on off, stabbed down to long-off
tossed outside off, patted back
shorter and spins back in from outside off, punched to cover off the back foot
forward and pushed back to the bowler

dragged short and wide outside off, Lewis skips back and lashes it between point and cover. Dhawan chases hard, but his foot was touching the rope while hauling the ball back into play. But the TV umpires rules Dhawan is alright and that's just three for WI
full and slides on outside off, driven to cover
Hope stays leg-side of this full ball on off and drives down to long-off
back of a length and spins in to take the inside edge and roll down to fine leg
tapped down the ground to long-off
more turn for Jadeja, blocked to the leg side off the back foot
back of a length on middle, bunted to midwicket
short on the hips, glanced away to deep square
bumper outside off, Lewis ducks away
fullish and around off, opens the face and dabs to the right of cover
picked off the pads to fine leg
back of a length and outside off, forced to point
